snippet.title: Connected Fates - Mother Direct 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Connected Fates is a story-driven puzzle adventure Role Playing Game inspired by Oneshot, Undertale, Omori and the Mother Series, featuring unconventional game mechanics.

This is an updated version of the trailer made for the Mother Direct 2024 event.

Check the game out on Itch.io: https://georgelifo.itch.io/connected-fates
Also available on GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/connected-fates/884580

Twitter/X: https://x.com/GeorgeLifo
___________________________

You guide a young child named Alex, through a dying world to help him find a way back home, and potentially save the world.
The game knows you exist, as you are able to influence it through unconventional means.

But be wary.
Your choices are permenant, and the world is in your hands.

Do not mess this up.

#connectedfates #gametrailers #indiegame
